name: SqlReportingServicesDeployment
description: Deploys the SQL reporting files to the SQL Reporting Service
author: Tobania
helpMarkDown: Deploys the SQL reporting files to the SQL Reporting Service

inputs.name: ReportFiles
inputs.label: Local Report Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the RDL file(s). Can use Wildcards: $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/**/*.rdl

inputs.name: ReportUploadRootPath
inputs.label: Report Upload Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the folder on the SSRS server to which the RDL files should be uploaded

inputs.name: UpdateDataSource
inputs.label: Update Data Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update Data Source references which exist in the reports to point to Data Sources which exist on the reporting server. This must begin with a forward slash (/).

inputs.name: IncludeDataSource
inputs.label: Include Data Sources
inputs.helpMarkDown: Upload Data Sources

inputs.name: DataSourceLocalPath
inputs.label: Local Data Source Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: "The path to the RDS file(s). Can use Wildcards: $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/**/*.rds,

inputs.name: DataSourceRootPath
inputs.label: Remote Data Source Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the folder on the SSRS server to which the RDS files should be uploaded. This must begin with a forward slash (/).

inputs.name: ConnectionString
inputs.label: Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: The connection string to update the Data Source with. If left empty, the connection string in the RDS file will be used.

inputs.name: IncludeDataSet
inputs.label: Include Datasets
inputs.helpMarkDown: Upload Datasets

inputs.name: DataSetLocalPath
inputs.label: Local Dataset Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: "The path to the RSD file(s). Can use Wildcards: $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/**/*.rsd,

inputs.name: DataSetRootPath
inputs.label: Remote Dataset Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the folder on the SSRS server to which the RSD files should be uploaded. This must begin with a forward slash (/).

inputs.name: IncludeResources
inputs.label: Include Resource Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Upload additional resource files

inputs.name: ResourceRootLocalPath
inputs.label: Local Resource Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The root path containing the Resource files to upload

inputs.name: ResourcePatterns
inputs.label: Content
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file patterns to the resources to upload. Each Newline is a new pattern. (Example:*.txt)

inputs.name: ResourceRootPath
inputs.label: Remote Resource Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the folder on the SSRS server to which the RESX file(s) should be uploaded. This must begin with a forward slash (/).

inputs.name: WebserviceUrl
inputs.label: Web Service URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the SSRS Web Service management endpoint (see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/reporting-services/report-server-web-service/methods/report-server-web-service-endpoints). (Example: http(s)://[ServernameFQDN]/ReportServer/ReportService2010.asmx?wsdl)

inputs.name: WsUsername
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username to use for connecting to the SSRS Web Service

inputs.name: WsPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password to use to connect to the SSRS Web Service. Use a Release or Environment Variable set to Secret on the Variables tab to encrypt this value.

inputs.name: AddResourceExtension
inputs.label: Add the Extension to the Resource Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enables or disables adding the file extension behind resource files.

inputs.name: OverrideExisting
inputs.label: Override Existing Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable or disable overriding of existing RDL files on the reporting server

inputs.name: UseVerbose
inputs.label: Verbose Logging
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable or disable verbose logging

inputs.name: CreateMissingFolders
inputs.label: Create Missing Folders
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable or disable creation of missing folders on the target
